Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
2 kushtarogigal Yaavaraiyum, Piramiyamullavargal Yaavaraiyum, Savaththinaal Theettuppattavargal Yaavaraiyum Paalayaththilirundhu Vilakkivida Isravel Puththirarukkuk Kattalaiyidu.

3 aanpillaiyaanaalum Penpillaiyaanaalum Appadippattavargalai Neengal Vilakki, Naan Vaasampannugira Thangal Paalayangalai Avargal Theettuppaduththaadhapadikku, Neengal Avargalaip Paalayaththirkup Purambaakkividakkadaveergal Endraar.
4 karththar Mosekku Sonnapadiye, Isravel Puththirar Seydhu, Avargalaip Paalayaththirkup Purambaakkivittaargal.
5 melum Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

6 isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Oru Purushanaanaalum Sthreeyaanaalum, Karththarudaiya Kattalaiyai Meeri Manidhar Seyyum Paavangalil Yaadhoru Paavaththai Seydhu Kutravaaliyaanaal,

7 avargal Thaangal Seydha Paavaththai Arikkaiyidakkadavargal; Appadippattavan Thaan Seydha Kutraththinimiththam Abaraadhaththin Mudhalode Aindhil Orupangai Adhigamaaik Kootti, Thaan Kutrancheydhavanukku Seluththakkadavan

8 adhaik Kettu Vaangugiradharku Inaththaan Oruvanum Illaadhirundhaal, Appozhudhu Avanukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyumpadi Aattukkadaa Seluththappaduvadhumallaamal,karththarukku Andha Abaraadham Seluththappattu, Adhu Aasaariyanai Seravendum.
9 isravel Puththirar Ereduththup Padaikkumpadi Aasaariyanidaththil Konduvarugira Ellaap Parisuththamaana Padaippum Avanudaiyadhaayirukkum.
10 ovvoruvarum Padaikkum Parisuththamaana Vasthukkal Avanudaiyadhaayirukkum; Oruvan Aasaariyanukkuk Kodukkiradhu Edhuvum Avanukke Uriyadhu Endru Sol Endraar.
11 karththar Moseyai Nokki:
12 nee Isravel Puththirarukku Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Oruvanudaiya Manaivi Pirarmugam Paarththu, Purushanukkuth Dhrogampanni,

13 oruvanode Samyogamaai Sayaniththirundha Vishayaththil Aval Theettuppattavalaayirundhum, Avaludaiya Purushan Kangalukku Adhu Maraikkappattu Velikku Varaamal Irukkirapodhum, Saatchiyillaamalum Aval Kaiyum Kalavumaagap Pidikkappadaamalum Irukkirapodhum,

14 erichchalin Aavi Avanmel Vandhu, Avan Thannudaiya Manaivi Theettuppaduththappattirukka, Theettuppaduththappatta Than Manaiviyinmel Krodhankondirundhaalum, Alladhu Avan Manaivi Theettuppaduththappadaadhirukka, Erichchalin Aavi Avanmel Vandhu, Avan Avalmel Krodhankondirundhaalum,

15 andhap Purushan Than Manaiviyai Aasaariyanidaththil Azhaiththukkondu Vandhu, Aval Nimiththam Oru Eppaa Alavaana Vaarkodhumai Maavile Paththil Oru Pangaip Padaippaagak Kodukkakkadavan; Adhu Erichchalin Kaanikkaiyum Akkiramaththai Ninaippoottum Kaanikkaiyumaai Iruppadhinaal, Adhinmel Enney Vaarkkaamalum Thoobavarkkampodaamalum Iruppaanaaga.
16 aasaariyan Avalai Sameebaththil Azhaiththu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Niruththi,
17 oru Manpaandaththile Parisuththa Jalam Vaarththu, Vaasasthalaththin Tharaiyilirukkum Puzhudhiyile Konjam Eduththu, Andha Jalaththile Pottu,

18 sthreeyaik Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Niruththi, Aval Mukkaattai Neekki, Erichchalin Kaanikkaiyaagiya Ninaippoottudhalin Kaanikkaiyai Aval Ullankaiyile Vaippaanaaga; Saabakaaranamaana Kasappaana Jalam Aasaariyan Kaiyilirukkavendum,

19 pinbu Aasaariyan Avalai Aanaiyiduviththu Oruvanum Unnode Sayaniyaamalum, Un Purushanukku Utpattirukkira Nee Theettuppadaththakkadhaaip Pirarmugam Baaraamalum Irundhaal, Saabakaaranamaana Indhak Kasappaana Jalaththin Dhoshaththukku Neengalaayiruppaai.
20 un Purushanukku Utpattirukkira Nee Pirarmugam Paarththu, Un Purushanodeyandri Anniyanode Samyokamaai Sayaniththuth Theettuppattiruppaayaanaal,
21 karththar Un Iduppu Soombavum, Un Vayiru Veengavumpanni, Unnai Un Janangalukkulle Saabamum Aanaiyidunkuriyumaaga Vaippaaraaga.

22 saabakaaranamaana Indha Jalam Un Vayiru Veengavum Iduppu Soombavum Pannumpadi, Un Kudalukkul Pravesikkakkadavadhu Engira Saabavaarththaiyaale Sthreeyai Aanaiyiduviththu Solvaanaaga. Adharku Andha Sthree: Aamen, Aamen, Endru Sollakkadaval.
23 pinbu Aasaariyan Indha Saaba Vaarththaigalai Oru Seettil Ezhudhi, Avaigalaik Kasappaana Jalaththinaal Kazhuvippottu,
24 saabakaaranamaana Andhak Kasappaana Jalaththai Aval Kudikkumpadi Pannuvaan; Appozhudhu Saabakaaranamaana Andha Jalam Avalukkul Irangik Kasappaakum.
25 pinbu Aasaariyan Erichchalin Kaanikkaiyai Andha Sthreeyin Kaiyilirundhu Vaangi, Adhaik Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Asaivaatti, Peedaththinmel Seluththi,
26 gnaabagakkuriyaaga Adhile Oru Kaippidi Niraiya Eduththu, Peedaththinmel Thaganiththu, Pinbu Sthreekku Andha Jalaththaik Kudikkumpadi Kodukkakkadavan.

27 andha Jalaththaik Kudikka Seydhapinbu Sambavippadhaavadhu: Aval Theettuppattu, Than Purushanukku Dhrogampanniyirundhaal, Saabakaaranamaana Andha Jalam Avalukkul Pravesiththuk Kasappundaanadhinaal, Aval Vayiru Veengi, Aval Iduppu Soombum; Ippadiye Andha Sthree Than Janangalukkulle Saabamaaga Iruppaal.
28 andha Sthree Theettuppadaamal Suththamaayirundhaal, Aval Adharku Neengalaaki, Garppandharikkaththakkavalaayiruppaal.
29 oru Sthree Than Purushanodeyandri Anniya Purushanode Serndhu Theettuppattadhinaal Undaana Erichchalukkum,

30 purushanmel Erichchalin Aavi Varugiradhinaal, Avan Than Manaiviyinmel Adaindha Samusayaththukkum Aduththa Pramaanam Idhuve. Avan Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Than Manaiviyai Niruththuvaanaaga; Aasaariyan Indhap Pramaanaththinpadiyellaam Avalukku Seyyakkadavan.
31 purushanaanavan Akkiramaththirku Neengalaayiruppaan; Appadippatta Sthreeyo, Than Akkiramaththai Sumappaal Endru Sol Endraar.
